Title: DNN Quick Form
Description:
DNN Quick Form is a module that makes creating simple contact forms extremely easy.  This is designed for those that extra flexibility when creating a simple contact form.  Build your own form in the environment of your choice.  Use all the standard ASP.NET Form controls to build the perfect form.  The initial release only supports emailing the form to designated users. 
REQUIRES DotNetNuke 6.1
HomeWiki:
Project Description
DNN Quick Form is a module that makes creating simple contact forms extremely easy. This is designed for those that extra flexibility when creating a simple contact form. Build your own form in the environment of your choice. Use all the standard ASP.NET Form controls to build the perfect form. The initial release only supports emailing the form to designated users.
